title: Looking for solid plat players to dynamic queue.
body:
Currently plat 5, went from gold 4 to plat 5 in 4 days, been pumping this smurf aiming for a higher rank, failed promos to p4 3 times now and im trying to find a group of good plat players to climb together. We can keep playing and try to get as high as we can, i have a lot of experience and play every role in a good level. Add Meion for more details.

Dynamic queue is much better when in a good team with 2+ good level players
